short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extenstion is made to notify you with UP jobs that matches your skills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an intelligent tool that is designed to help freelancers, that can search for the freelancing jobs with your skills and it will notify you from all the available jobs which can apply. Using this extension, you'll never miss the new jobs and be the first to apply over the collected jobs.
